channel.title: blogging on C'est la Z
channel.description: Recent content in blogging on C'est la Z

item.title: 10 years blogging
item.description: I read Doug Peterson's post this moirning on his 10 years blogging. I realized that I'm also finishing off my 10th year of doing the same. I also noticed that for a second year in a row, I've eclipsed 100 posts. That's an average of a bit under 2 posts a week which is more than I thought particularly when it feels like I go through multi weeks stretches without writing anything.
